name: Early Intervention Project
description: A human services program that addresses families’ socio-economic concerns. A case manager assists families with housing, job training, health care and immigration casework. Support with identifying and assisting children with special needs is available.
fullDescription: A human services program that addresses families’ socio-economic concerns. A case manager assists families with housing, job training, health care and immigration casework. Support with identifying and assisting children with special needs is available.
whatTheyOffer: A human services program that addresses families’ socio-economic concerns. A case manager assists families with housing, job training, health care and immigration casework. Support with identifying and assisting children with special needs is available.
howToGetIt: Request application or for more information use ONLINE Form Interested parent(s) will fill out and complete an application form and submit paycheck stubs from two recent months for the verification of income eligibility. The Office Manager will check the returned application to ensure the form has been completed with the necessary information.
